name: triangulate-image
description: Converts images in to triangular polygons.
author: Georg Fischer <snorpey@gmail.com.com>

scripts.build: npm run build-node && npm run build-browsers
scripts.build-browsers: node build.js -b && node build.js -bp && node build.js -bm && node build.js -bmp && node build.js -be && node build.js -bem && node build.js -beu && node build.js -bemu
scripts.prepublish: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test: npm run test-node && npm run test-browsers
scripts.test-browsers: npm run test-browser && npm run test-browser-min
